metadata.title: CVE-2019-13680 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in TLS in Google Chrome prior to 77.0.3865.75allowed a remote attacker to spoof client IP address to websites viacrafted TLS connections.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
